amendment.description: Amendment strikes section 102 of the bill which prohibits the use of funds to be used to implement any competitive sourcing actions under OMB Circular A-76 or High Performing Organizations for the Army Corps of Engineers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 102 of the bill, which prohibits the use of funds to be used to implement any competitive sourcing actions under OMB Circular A-76 or High Performing Organizations for the Army Corps of Engineers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 224 - 196 (Roll no. 539).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 224 - 196 (Roll no. 539).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Sessions.
